text: - At Portland General Electric,
we're thinking ahead about decarbonization

and sustainability for
all of our customers.

AWS is the firm that's really
gonna help us not only scale
but to do it with velocity
and to bring capabilities and capacity
that we just couldn't get otherwise.
On the customer side,

AWS is the centerpiece for
all of our microservices.
And so when we have big storm events,

all of that traffic is
able to be supported

through a scalable platform
that AWS brings us.
And then on the operational side,
we're doing a lot of stuff

to really make things more
reliable for customers.

So it's everything ranging
from looking at defective poles

that are on the street to
what our strategy is gonna be
for transportation electrification.

For customers, at least at
Portland General Electric,
there's the trilemma that we talk about,
which is getting reliable energy
that's also affordable and clean.

And with the technology
that we have today,

you could really kind of get
two of those but not all three,

but I think using technologies
that we get from AWS,

it helps us bridge that
a little bit closer.
(light music)
